author: Special Correspondent
text:
An aged couple is said to have attempted suicide by consuming poison along Kalikappan tank bund under the Othakadai police station limits.

While the man, Ponnambalam (62), succumbed, his wife Amutha (55), has been admitted to the Government Rajaji hospital. The couple, living in Odaipatti, were living alone after their son and two daughters were married off. People who noticed the couple lying along the bund at around 3 p.m. alerted the police. While the woman was rushed to the GRH and was being provided treatment, the man had already died. The police suspect that lack of care by children or debts could have triggered the couple to take the extreme step.
title: Couple consume poison: man dies
